plot: Apu's marriage is on the rocks after Manjula finds out he cheated on her.

Homer keeps quiet about seeing Apu kissing delivery lady Annette but Manjula sees it on the CCTV footage and kicks her husband out. However their eight children miss him and speak their first words to say they want him back. Homer takes Manjula to find Apu just in time to stop him from hanging himself and Manjula agrees to have him back,provided he performs a few penances first.—don @ minifie-1

Homer witnesses an affair between Apu and Annette, the Squishee Lady at the Kwik-E-Mart. Homer and Marge try to keep this information a secret, but Manjula finds out about Apu's infidelity from the surveillance footage at the Kwik-E-Mart. Manjula kicks Apu out and she serves him with divorce papers. Homer and Marge try to save Apu and Manjula's marriage. Manjula makes a list of things for Apu to do, he manages to complete all of the tasks on the list.—dawsonpersi
